abilities.name: Force Edge
abilities.rule: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack that targets a unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**), improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Ancient’s Banner
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

abilities.name: Apothecary’s Narthecium
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, if the bearer is not destroyed, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding **CHARACTERS**) to the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Ancient’s Banner
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Apothecary’s Narthecium
wargear_abilities.rule: In your Command phase, if the bearer is not destroyed, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding **CHARACTERS**) to the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options:
■ For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Terminator’s storm bolter can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 incinerator
◦ 1 psilencer
◦ 1 psycannon
■ 1 Terminator can have its storm bolter replaced with 1 Apothecary’s narthecium.

■ 1 Terminator’s storm bolter can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 incinerator and 1 Ancient’s banner
◦ 1 psilencer and 1 Ancient’s banner
◦ 1 psycannon and 1 Ancient’s banner
◦ 1 storm bolter and 1 Ancient’s banner*
* *That model’s storm bolter cannot be replaced.*
unit_composition:

■ **3-9 Terminators**

**Every model is equipped with:** storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.
